TopicTitle: how do i update my mod on curse???

Articles.Content: ive had my mod on curse for a while now (http://mods.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/242459-kerbalkingsinc) and i do whanted to fix some bugs and i did but how do i update my mod on curse????????

[MOD - Moved to Add-on Discussions, as this topic pertains to updating of published add-ons in general]

Updating add-ons hosted on Curse are best done through the new CurseForge site.

- Go to your project page on CurseForge here

- On the banner at the top, click on the ⬆ File button

- Upload the zip file containing your updated add-on

- Select the appropriate release type (Release, Beta or Alpha)

- In the Changelog field, describe the changes you've made to your add-on since the last released version

- Tick the appropriate checkboxes for the Supported Game Versions

- Click Submit File

- Once the file has been uploaded, it will take some time for CurseForge admins to review and approve your update; check back regularly for notifications.
